settings.title: Webhook.Manager Settings
settings.webhook_intro: You can use the following Webhook URL in your external scripts to trigger events on Homey:
settings.webhook_extended:
Make sure that all your POST actions that will trigger a flow on Homey have a json encoded body with the following properties: {"event":"your_event_name_here","data1":"data_field_1_here","data2":"data_field_2_here","data3":"data_field_3_here"}
data1, data2, and data3 are optional.

Example PHP code:
